name: The Old House (itch)
description:
This is a 5-10 minute game that takes place and is based on the single story house where I grew up in Orlando.  You play as me returning to the house for a nostalgic visit.  By the time you ring the doorbell you are greeted by a swift bash on the head and dragged unconsciously inside.  After waking up in a locked room, your only chance is to find a way to escape while "it" tries to stop you.

Move - w/a/s/d

Jump - _Spacebar

Crouch - Left Control

Zoom - Scroll Wheel
